about_the_game:
Your friends have been transformed into trash!

Now it's up to you, as the only one left, to save them. With a little help from the Good Witch of the Woods and her magical broom, sprint across the waste cleaning up trash, fight the evil minions and save your friends. Reclaim lost items and gain power ups to help you on your quest to defeat the Evil Witch of the Waste.

Become the hero and save the town from being consumed by junk and debris!

Genre: 3d single player action adventure

Audience: Recommended for 10 +

Platform: Built for PC

Features:
Open exploration
Combat or stealth
Level up
Controller support

name: Redumption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G5900
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Discrete

short_description: Redumption is an action adventure game where you explore a town consumed by the waste. Fight bosses and retrieve precious items to save your friends from the witch's curse. Can you clean up the town and achieve redumption?
